name: ENO
description: One Character. One Minute. One Button. One Mediocre Indie Dev Team with PASSION. One Letter. OOO OOOO OOOOO OOO. -- These are the things that bring ENO to life. Play as Eno, a ferret in a ball with a PURPOSE in life- to be a FERRET in a BALL. Traverse through three rad levels in an attempt to get Eno to the finish line in 1 minute with again, 1 button. Hold the button down to slow down, release to jump, hold down in the air to ground pound. Simple. As. That. -- We can only give you one paragraph, so this is all we will leave you with. Can you conquer the ENO? We'll leave that one up to you.
